column4: hey guys im using ubuntu and i have just bought and external hdd. i wanted to know which is the best format to use for that hdd and im planning to share that hdd with a windows network. im wonder which is the best to use, ext3 or ntfs format??
I suggest you format it as either ntfs, or fat32.
If you use IFS to allow windows XP to read it, you will have problems with USB drives.
